result.name: Investigation of the association of SNP rs2072183 in NPC1L1 gene and LDL-C reduction induced by hyzetimibe treatment.
result.description: An investigation into the association of SNP rs2072183 in NPC1L1 gene and LDL-C reduction induced by hyzetimibe treatment in a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, balanced-parallel placebo-controlled group study
